title: Products page route + sidebar nav + product list
description: Create the /_authenticated/products route with debounced search input (300ms via @tanstack/pacer useDebouncedValue) and 'Add Product' button placeholder. Implement ProductList component with usePaginatedQuery + useVirtualizer for virtualized infinite scroll (initial 20 items, auto-load more on scroll). Implement ProductRow with image thumbnail (Avatar with fallback), name, and macro summary (calories, protein, carbs, fat as integers). Add 'Products' link to sidebar navigation in app-sidebar.tsx with Lucide Package icon. Create shared product-schema.ts with Zod validation schema. Covers FR-12, FR-13, FR-14, NFR-1, NFR-6, NFR-7, NFR-8.
